leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 计算系统生物学与动力学生态
leaf_cluster.typical_objects: ODE/PDE 模型, 代谢网络, 信号通路, 参数与不确定性
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 建模→参数估计→仿真→敏感性/UQ→反演→验证
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 建模语言/仿真器 + 参数估计/UQ + 数据拟合工作流

unit.unit_name: 多尺度/多组学耦合动力学与混合模型

queries: [WEB] hybrid mechanistic machine learning biology github

tools.name: cell-eval
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive suite for evaluating cellular perturbation prediction models
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed to evaluate the performance of computational models that predict cellular responses to perturbations (e.g., CRISPR, drugs), facilitating benchmarking in systems biology.

tools.name: qupath-extension-cellpose
tools.one_line_profile: QuPath extension for Cellpose integration
tools.detailed_description: An extension enabling the use of Cellpose, a deep learning-based cellular segmentation tool, directly within the QuPath bioimage analysis software environment for whole slide image analysis.

tools.name: Protein-Localization-Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Zero-shot text-to-image synthesis for protein localization
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of CELL-E, a model for predicting and synthesizing protein localization patterns from text descriptions using a transformer-based architecture.

tools.name: ApPredict
tools.one_line_profile: Cardiac action potential prediction under drug-induced block
tools.detailed_description: A Chaste extension for predicting changes in cardiac action potentials resulting from drug-induced ion channel block, used in cardiotoxicity safety pharmacology.

tools.name: Chaste
tools.one_line_profile: Cancer, Heart and Soft Tissue Environment simulation package
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose simulation package aimed at multi-scale, computationally demanding problems arising in biology and physiology, specifically focusing on cancer, heart, and soft tissue modeling.

tools.name: CompuCell3D
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-cell simulation environment using GGH model
tools.detailed_description: A flexible, scriptable modeling environment for simulating complex multi-cellular systems using the Glazier-Graner-Hogeweg (GGH) model (Cellular Potts Model).

tools.name: WholeCell
tools.one_line_profile: Mycoplasma genitalium whole-cell model
tools.detailed_description: The source code for the first complete computational model of a whole cell (Mycoplasma genitalium), integrating multiple cellular processes.

tools.name: WholeCellEcoliRelease
tools.one_line_profile: Whole-cell model of Escherichia coli
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive computational model of the E. coli cell, simulating its life cycle and cellular processes.

tools.name: WholeCellKB
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge base software for whole-cell models
tools.detailed_description: A database platform designed to store, organize, and retrieve the extensive biological data required for building and parameterizing whole-cell simulations.

tools.name: WholeCellSimDB
tools.one_line_profile: Database for whole-cell model simulation results
tools.detailed_description: A hybrid SQL/HDF database system for storing, indexing, and retrieving the massive datasets generated by whole-cell simulations.

tools.name: WholeCellViz
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for whole-cell simulations
tools.detailed_description: A web-based visualization tool for exploring and analyzing the complex, high-dimensional data produced by whole-cell models.

tools.name: vEcoli
tools.one_line_profile: Vivarium-based E. coli whole-cell model
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the E. coli whole-cell model using the Vivarium framework for composable biological simulations.

tools.name: wcEcoli
tools.one_line_profile: Whole-cell E. coli model codebase
tools.detailed_description: The codebase for the Covert Lab's whole-cell E. coli model, enabling simulation of cellular physiology.

tools.name: DEMENTpy
tools.one_line_profile: Spatially explicit microbial systems modeling framework
tools.detailed_description: A trait- and individual-based modeling framework for simulating microbial community dynamics and ecosystem processes in a spatially explicit manner.

tools.name: MorpheuS
tools.one_line_profile: Neural dynamic 360-degree surface reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A neural rendering approach for reconstructing dynamic 3D surfaces from monocular RGB-D video, applicable in computer vision and potentially biological structure imaging.

tools.name: HybridML
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for hybrid mechanistic and machine learning modeling
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to combine mechanistic modeling with machine learning approaches, facilitating the creation of hybrid models for complex systems.

tools.name: datanator
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for whole-cell modeling data aggregation
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for discovering, aggregating, and processing the diverse biological data required for parameterizing whole-cell models.

tools.name: wc_lang
tools.one_line_profile: Language for describing whole-cell models as reaction networks
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that defines the schema and data structure for whole-cell models, enabling the description of models as reaction networks.

tools.name: wc_model_gen
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for designing whole-cell models from large datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for systematically and scalably generating whole-cell models by integrating large datasets.

tools.name: wc_rules
tools.one_line_profile: Rule-based modeling library for whole-cell models
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for rule-based modeling, specifically designed to support the complexity of whole-cell simulations.

tools.name: wc_sim
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-algorithmic simulator for whole-cell models
tools.detailed_description: A simulator that executes whole-cell models using multiple algorithms to handle different biological processes concurrently.

tools.name: COSMOS
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of spatially resolved multi-omics data using GNNs
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool that uses graph neural networks to integrate and analyze spatially resolved multi-omics data.

tools.name: pyvipr
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization widget for systems biology models (PySB, BNGL, SBML)
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter widget for static and dynamic visualization of systems biology models defined in PySB, BNGL, or SBML formats.

tools.name: PhysiCell
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-based multicellular simulator
tools.detailed_description: A flexible and scalable physics-based simulator for multicellular systems, widely used in cancer research and tissue engineering.

tools.name: IAN
tools.one_line_profile: Intelligent System for Omics Data Analysis and Discovery
tools.detailed_description: An R-based system designed to facilitate the analysis and discovery process in omics data research.

tools.name: PK-Sim
tools.one_line_profile: Whole-body physiologically based pharmacokinetic (PBPK) modeling tool
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive software tool for whole-body physiologically based pharmacokinetic modeling, allowing simulation of drug distribution in the body.

tools.name: PhysiCell Studio
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical editor and visualization tool for PhysiCell models
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface for creating, editing, and running PhysiCell models, as well as visualizing simulation results.

tools.name: python-loader
tools.one_line_profile: Data loader for PhysiCell digital snapshots
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility library for loading and processing data generated by PhysiCell simulations.

tools.name: RatInABox
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation of movement and spatial cell types in continuous environments
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for simulating agent movement and neural activity (e.g., place cells, grid cells) in continuous environments, used in neuroscience research.

tools.name: FUSF Hydrophone Scanner
tools.one_line_profile: Software and hardware design for ultrasound transducer characterization
tools.detailed_description: Open-source software and hardware design for a hydrophone scanner used to spatially characterize ultrasound transducers.

tools.name: XFEM_Fracture2D
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab solver for 2D fracture problems using Extended Finite Element Method
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab program for solving fracture problems involving arbitrary multiple crack propagations in 2D linear-elastic solids.

tools.name: TechnoEconomicCellSelection
tools.one_line_profile: Optimization tool for battery cell selection in electric trucks
tools.detailed_description: A tool to assist in selecting the optimal battery cell for long-haul truck electrification based on techno-economic criteria.

tools.name: vivarium
tools.one_line_profile: WebGPU-powered toolkit for cellular automata simulation
tools.detailed_description: A modern toolkit leveraging WebGPU for creating and running cellular automata simulations.

tools.name: BIONIC
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for biological network integration and analysis
tools.detailed_description: BIONIC (Biological Network Integration using Convolutions) is a deep learning-based tool that integrates multiple biological networks to produce high-quality, low-dimensional node features containing topological and functional information.

tools.name: morpheus.R
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for the Morpheus matrix visualization and analysis widget
tools.detailed_description: Provides an R interface to the Morpheus JavaScript library, enabling interactive heatmaps and matrix visualization/analysis directly from R environments.

tools.name: morpheus.js
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive matrix visualization and analysis tool for omics data
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library for versatile matrix visualization and analysis, widely used for gene expression heatmaps, clustering, and exploratory data analysis in systems biology.

tools.name: Morpheus (Proteomics)
tools.one_line_profile: Mass spectrometry-based proteomics database search algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A proteomics software tool designed for high-mass-accuracy mass spectrometry data, focusing on peptide identification and database searching.

tools.name: PhysiCellModelManager.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia interface for managing PhysiCell simulation campaigns
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package designed to set up, execute, and manage large-scale simulation campaigns using the PhysiCell multicellular simulator.

tools.name: SingleCellExperiment
tools.one_line_profile: S4 class for storing single-cell experiment data
tools.detailed_description: Defines the standard S4 class for storing data from single-cell experiments, including expression data, metadata, and dimensionality reduction results, serving as a foundation for the Bioconductor single-cell ecosystem.

tools.name: BIANA
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for biological information integration and network analysis
tools.detailed_description: BIANA (Biological Integration And Network Analysis) is a Python framework for integrating biological data from various sources and performing network analysis.

tools.name: Vivarium (Jax)
tools.one_line_profile: JAX-based multi-agent simulator for AI and ALife research
tools.detailed_description: A highly parallelizable multi-agent simulation framework built on JAX, designed for research in Artificial Life (ALife) and AI, supporting complex agent behaviors and environments.

tools.name: AIDO
tools.one_line_profile: Multiscale foundation models for predictive and programmable biology
tools.detailed_description: AI-Driven Digital Organism (AIDO) is a system of multiscale foundation models designed to predict, simulate, and program biological systems across various scales.

tools.name: REDDA
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural network model for drug-disease association prediction
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a heterogeneous graph neural network that integrates multiple biological relations to predict drug-disease associations, facilitating computational drug repurposing.

tools.name: UQ_PhysiCell
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification package for PhysiCell models
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to perform uncertainty quantification across the input space of PhysiCell multicellular models, supporting both desktop and high-throughput computing environments.

tools.name: IntegratedLearner
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated machine learning framework for multi-omics classification
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning tool designed for multi-omics classification and prediction, enabling the integration of heterogeneous biological datasets for improved predictive modeling.

tools.name: vivarium
tools.one_line_profile: Microsimulation framework for public health and demographics
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based microsimulation framework developed by IHME for modeling complex adaptive systems, primarily used in public health and demographic research.

tools.name: vivarium_public_health
tools.one_line_profile: Public health disease and intervention modeling tools for Vivarium
tools.detailed_description: A component of the Vivarium framework specifically designed to model diseases, risk factors, and health interventions for epidemiological research.

tools.name: MicrovesselChaste
tools.one_line_profile: Microvessel modeling add-on for the Chaste framework
tools.detailed_description: An add-on project for the Chaste computational biology library, specifically designed for modeling microvessel formation, angiogenesis, and vascular dynamics.

tools.name: PyChaste
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for the Chaste computational biology library
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for Chaste, enabling researchers to utilize Chaste's C++ based multi-scale computational biology simulations within a Python environment.

tools.name: MORPHEUS-1
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal transformer model for ultrasonic lucid dream induction
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the MORPHEUS-1 transformer model, designed to process multi-modal data for generating ultrasonic sequences intended to induce and stabilize lucid dreams (neuro-stimulation modeling).

tools.name: mcp-biomodelling-servers
tools.one_line_profile: Model Context Protocol servers for biological mechanistic modeling tools
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MCP servers that provide interfaces for biological modeling tools like NeKo, MaBoSS, and PhysiCell, enabling their integration into agentic AI workflows.

tools.name: pctk
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis utilities for PhysiCell and PhysiBoSS simulations
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit containing scripts and utilities for post-processing and analyzing simulation data generated by PhysiCell and PhysiBoSS multicellular systems.

tools.name: morpheus-lib
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic sparse matrix library for scientific computing
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library providing dynamic matrix types and algorithms for sparse matrices, facilitating high-performance scientific computing and numerical analysis.

tools.name: morpheus-astro
tools.one_line_profile: Morphological semantic segmentation for astronomical images
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning library for generating pixel-level morphological semantic segmentation maps of astronomical images, aiding in galaxy classification and analysis.

tools.name: T1K
tools.one_line_profile: Genotyping tool for polymorphic genes using RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A computational method to genotype highly polymorphic genes (e.g., KIR, HLA) using bulk or single-cell RNA-seq, WGS, or WES data.

tools.name: CellExplorer
tools.one_line_profile: GUI and processing module for single-cell electrophysiology data
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface and standardized processing framework for exploring, classifying, and analyzing single cells acquired using extracellular electrodes.

tools.name: sbml2hyb
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for SBML compatible hybrid modelling of biological systems
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to facilitate hybrid modeling of biological systems by converting SBML (Systems Biology Markup Language) models into hybrid specifications.

tools.name: PhysiCell_tools
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of utility scripts for PhysiCell simulations
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python scripts and tools to assist with processing, visualizing, and managing data for PhysiCell multicellular simulations.

tools.name: xml2jupyter
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter widget generator for PhysiCell XML configurations
tools.detailed_description: A tool that generates Jupyter notebook widgets from PhysiCell XML configuration files, enabling interactive simulation configuration and execution.

tools.name: MetaMorpheus
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated proteomics search software with calibration and PTM discovery
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive proteomics software suite that performs bottom-up, top-down, and label-free quantification (LFQ) analysis, featuring integrated calibration and post-translational modification (PTM) discovery.

tools.name: Tellurium
tools.one_line_profile: Python environment for modeling and simulating biological systems
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based environment for systems biology modeling, supporting SBML, Antimony, and various simulation engines for ODE and stochastic models.

tools.name: magres-format
tools.one_line_profile: Parser for CCP-NC ab-initio magnetic resonance file format
tools.detailed_description: A library for parsing and processing the CCP-NC ab-initio magnetic resonance file format and associated parameters.

tools.name: tidySingleCellExperiment
tools.one_line_profile: Tidyverse adapter for SingleCellExperiment objects
tools.detailed_description: An R package that enables the use of Tidyverse principles and functions with SingleCellExperiment objects for efficient single-cell data analysis.

tools.name: Virtual Cell (VCell)
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive framework for modeling and simulating cell biology
tools.detailed_description: A software platform for modeling and simulation of cell biology, supporting both deterministic and stochastic simulations of reaction-diffusion systems.

tools.name: vcell-solvers
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical solvers for the Virtual Cell framework
tools.detailed_description: The collection of numerical solvers used by the Virtual Cell (VCell) framework for executing biological simulations.

tools.name: vivarium-cell
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of cell models for the Vivarium simulation engine
tools.detailed_description: A library of biological models and composites designed for simulating cellular processes using the Vivarium framework.

tools.name: vivarium-core
tools.one_line_profile: Core engine for Vivarium composite simulations
tools.detailed_description: The core interface and execution engine for Vivarium, a framework for integrative multiscale modeling and simulation of complex biological systems.

tools.name: drug-drug-interaction
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for predicting drug-drug interactions
tools.detailed_description: A Python package implementing methods for predicting potential drug-drug interactions by integrating chemical, biological, phenotypic, and network data.
